Mario Bross
Description: Mario is an Italian plumber and the main hero of the Mushroom Kingdom. With his red cap and distinctive mustache, he is always ready to save Princess Peach from Bowser\'s clutches.
Skills: Mario excels in versatility. He can perform acrobatic jumps, use power-ups like the Fire Flower or Super Star, and adapt to any challenge thanks to his courage and determination.
Luigi
Description: Luigi is Mario\'s younger brother, known for his green outfit and slightly more cautious attitude. Although he often lives in his brother\'s shadow, he is a hero in his own right.

Skills: Luigi stands out for his ability to jump higher than Mario and his agility in tricky situations. He faces ghosts with his trusty vacuum in Luigi’s Mansion and proves that bravery comes in many forms.
Peach
Description: Peach is the princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, known for her kindness and ability to lead with wisdom. Although she is often captured by Bowser, she is no helpless princess.
Skills: Peach uses her umbrella to glide long distances and can unleash magical powers to protect her kingdom. Her calmness under pressure is her greatest strength.
Toad
Description: Toad is one of the loyal inhabitants of the Mushroom Kingdom and a close friend of Mario and Peach. Although small in size, he has a big heart.
Skills: Toad is extremely fast and agile, making him an excellent collector of coins and items. His determination makes him brave even in the most dangerous moments.
Toadette
Description: Toadette is a brave and cheerful inhabitant of the Mushroom Kingdom. With her pink cap and positive attitude, she is always ready to join Mario and his friends on their adventures.

Skills: Toadette is agile and versatile, with the ability to transform into Superstar Toadette thanks to certain power-ups. Her skill in interacting with objects and solving puzzles makes her indispensable in most missions. Additionally, her strong determination and energy are contagious to everyone around her.
Bowser
Description: Bowser, the King of the Koopas, is the main villain of the saga. With his intimidating appearance and drive to conquer the Mushroom Kingdom, he is Mario\'s eternal rival.
Skills: Bowser possesses immense strength, the ability to throw fireballs, and create impossible obstacles. His persistence makes him a formidable enemy.
